issue.title: [C++] Add support for writing MetadataVersion::V4-compatible IPC messages for compatibility with library versions <= 0.17.1
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-9265](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-9265). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
While we need to increment the MetadataVersion, we should not strand old library versions since V4 is backward compatible with V5.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-9265?focusedCommentId=17152132) by Antoine Pitrou (apitrou):*
Unions should not be allowed when writing v4 data, and probably not when reading either (unless we implement the required compatibility code).
